name: One-Bowl Carrot Oat Muffins
author: Del Monte
summary: Breakfast or snack time, these moist muffins are a wholesome treat to go.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can Del Monte® Sliced Carrots, drained
¾ cup packed light brown sugar
½ cup dried cranberries or golden raisins
½ cup chopped pecans or walnuts
directions: Place carrots in a large mixing bowl
Using a potato masher, mash carrots until only small pieces remain
Add brown sugar, oil and egg; mix well
Add flour, oats, baking powder, cinnamon and salt
Mix with a wooden spoon just until dry ingredients are moistened
Spoon batter into 12 paper-lined medium muffin cups
Bake 25 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean
Let cool 10 minutes before removing from pan
Muffins may be frozen for up to 3 months
